Title: Desecrator Annihilator
Description:
My mother was a hero. She deserves peace and rest, not this... enslavement! None of our heroes do.

They must pay for this. And our ancestors must rest once more with their weapons, with honor. Take the weapons back from those desecrators!
ObjectivesText: Kill Nokhud Desecrators and Ukhel Gravestirrers, and recover the ancestral weapons they have taken.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet with Zorig further in the Eternal Kurgans.
RewardText: This is a good start. I can use these weapons to free their owners... I hope.
